column5: July 22 U.S. drillers this week added oil rigs for a fourth consecutive week  according to a closely followed report on Friday  with the recent return to the well pad expected to soften the decline in domestic crude production.     Drillers added 14 oil rigs in the week to July 22  bringing the total rig count up to 371  compared with 659 a year ago  energy services firm Baker Hughes Inc said.
